  • Uses of Behaviour in game.attack

    Classes in game.attack that implement Behaviour
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AttackBehaviour
    Simulates attack behaviour of actors (Player/Allosaur) towards target (Stegosaur)- may or may not occur depending on whether certain criteria is met.

  • Uses of Behaviour in game.breed

    Classes in game.breed that implement Behaviour
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BreedingBehaviour
    Simulates breeding behaviour of DinoActors - breeding might or might not occur depending on whether certain criteria is met.

  • Uses of Behaviour in game.dinosaurs

    Fields in game.dinosaurs with type parameters of type Behaviour
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private ArrayList<Behaviour>
    DinoActor.behaviour
    An ArrayList of standard behaviours that the DinoActor should have.
    private ArrayList<Behaviour>
    DinoActor.interactiveBehaviours
    ArrayList of Behaviours that requires two Actors to be in adjacent squares.

  • Uses of Behaviour in game.feeding

    Classes in game.feeding that implement Behaviour
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    FeedingBehaviour
    Simulates the feeding behaviour of an Actor.

  • Uses of Behaviour in game.movement

    Classes in game.movement that implement Behaviour
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    FollowBehaviour
    Behaviour class that simulates Actor moving towards another Actor, Item or Ground.
    class 
    FollowFoodOnGroundBehaviour
    Special class that simulates behaviour of a DinoActor moving towards food it spotted on the ground.
    class 
    FollowFoodOnPlantBehaviour
    Special class that simulates behaviour of a herbivorous DinoActor moving towards a Tree or Bush to eat its fruits.
    class 
    FollowMateBehaviour
    Special class that simulates behaviour of a DinoActor following another DinoActor to mate with it.
    class 
    FollowVictimBehaviour
    Special class that simulates behaviour of a DinoActor following another DinoActor to attack it for food.

  • Uses of Behaviour in game.player

    Classes in game.player that implement Behaviour
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    FedByPlayerBehaviour
    Simulates the behaviour of the Player feeding the DinoActors - feeding may or may not occur depending on whether certain criteria is met.

  • Uses of Behaviour in game.pregnancy

    Classes in game.pregnancy that implement Behaviour
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    PregnancyBehaviour
    Simulates the pregnancy behaviour of an Actor.

  • Uses of Behaviour in game.wander

    Classes in game.wander that implement Behaviour
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    WanderBehaviour
    Simulated the wandering behaviour of DinoActors - wandering may or may not occur depending on whether certain criteria is met.
